title: Yasuo Top
body: just did a game yasuo top game against a garen and was winning lane till I got ganked but whoever says yasuo needs to be full crit I prove you wrong

replies.body:
No one has actually said Yasuo have to be fully crit tho.

His crit chance doubles with his passive but his crit does 10% less damage so basically get 50% crit chance and 100% crit it is. That's why summoners are like 'go crit and win'

Why don't you try AP Yasuo and just bounce around a lot with your e.
